hr.p: Mission: CCSD #1 WILL PREPARE AND EMPOWER ALL STUDENTS FOR SUCCESSFUL, LIFELONG LEARNING THROUGH EFFECTIVE TEACHING.

div.p: Don’t be fooled by the calendar. There are only as many days in the year as you make use of.- Charles Richards
Many career opportunities exist within our district. We are seeking qualified and loyal folks to aid in the advancement of our students.
CCSD #1 School Board information. Next School Board Meeting is May 18, at Moorcroft K-8

div.p: CCSD #1 has partnered with Amazon.com to offer School Rewards. You shop on Amazon via the link above and a portion (up to 15%) is donated back to the district. Back to School shopping has never been so rewarding!!!
